item.title: TX-37 Spur West at I-10 Onramp
item.description: TX-37 Spur West at I-10/US-180 East/US-85 South. This is the onramp for Exit 2 on I-10. In the background of the photo is the city limit sign for the Village of Vinton.

item.title: TX-37 Spur East at I-10 West
item.description: TX-37 Spur east at I-10/US-180 West/US-85 North. This is the onramp for I-10 Exit 2.

item.title: I-10 East at TX-37 Spur
item.description: I-10 East, Exit 2 offramp at TX-37 Spur. Turn left on TX-37 Spur for Westway; turn right on TX-37 Spur for Vinton. Continue ahead for I-10.

item.title: US-180/US-62 West at TX-54
item.description: US-180/US-62 west at TX-54 junction.

item.title: US-62/US-180 West at TX-54
item.description: US-62/US-180 west at TX-54 junction. Use TX-54 south for Van Horn; use US-62/US-180 west for El Paso.

item.title: US-62/US-180 West Approaching TX-54
item.description: US-62/US-180 west approaching TX-54 junction.

item.title: US-62/US-180 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-62/US-180 west. Distance to El Paso and Las Cruces (NM). Taken just west of RM-652 and the Texas-New Mexico state line.

item.title: End RM-652 at US-62/US-180
item.description: End RM-652 at US-62/US-180 junction.

item.title: End RM-652 at US-62/US-180
item.description: RM-652 approaching US-62/US-180 junction.

item.title: US-180 East at NM-152
item.description: US-180 east at NM-152 in Santa Clara.

item.title: US-180 East at NM-152
item.description: US-180 east at NM-152. Use NM-152 for Hanover. Continue east on US-180 for Bayard; turn right for Santa Clara.

item.title: US-180 East at NM-152
item.description: US-180 east at NM-152 junction in Santa Clara.

item.title: US-180 East at NM-15
item.description: US-180 east at NM-15 north to Pinos Altos, Lake Roberts, and Gila Cliff Dwellings National Monument.

item.title: End NM-90 North at US-180
item.description: End NM-90 north at US-180 east.

item.title: US-180 West/NM-26 East at I-10
item.description: US-180 West/NM-26 East at I-10 west. Turn left for I-10 west to Lordsburg. Continue straight for US-180 West/NM-26 East for Silver City and Hatch.

item.title: US-180 West/NM-26 East
item.description: US-180 West/NM-26 East in Deming, approaching I-10.

item.title: BL-10 East at US-180/NM-11
item.description: BL-10 east at US-180/NM-11. Turn left for US-180 west; turn right for NM-11 south.

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exits 82A and 82B
item.description: I-10 approaching Exits 82A and 82B. Exits 82AB - US-180 West/Silver City/NM-26 East/To I-25/Hatch.

item.title: US-62/US-180 West at NM-18
item.description: US-62/US-180 west at NM-18 junction. Turn right for NM-18 north to Lovington; left for NM-18 south to Eunice. Continue straight for US-62/US-180 to Carlsbad.

item.title: US-62/US-180 West - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome to New Mexico - Land of Enchantment on US-62/US-180 west at the Texas state line.

item.title: US-62/US-180 East - Texas State Line
item.description: Texas State Line on US-62/US-180 East. Entering Gaines County. Also entering Central Time Zone, although that sign is a few yards down.

item.title: US-62/US-180 East - Leaving New Mexico
item.description: You Are Now Leaving New Mexico - The Land of Enchantment on US-62/US-180 east. Taken at the New Mexico/Texas State Line.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 23B, 23A, and 22B
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 23B - US-62/US-180/Paisano Dr/Chelsea St. Approaching Exit 23A - Raynolds St. Also approaching Exit 22B - US-54/Alamogordo/Ju√°rez, Mexico/Fort Bliss.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 24
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 24 - Geronimo Drive/Trowbridge Drive. Approaching US-62/US-180/Chelsea St/Paisano Drive, and Raynolds St.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 23B, 23A, and 22B
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 23B - US-62/US-180/Paisano Drive/Chelsea St. Approaching Exit 23A - Raynolds St. Also approaching Exit 22B - US-54/Alamogordo/Fort Bliss/Juarez, Mexico.

item.title: I-110/US-54 North at I-10
item.description: I-110/US-54 North at I-10/US-180 jct. Merge left for US-54 North/Alamogordo (NM), and I-10/US-180 West/Downtown/Las Cruces (NM). Merge right for I-10(not-signed)/US-180 East/Van Horn/San Antonio. This is the northern end of I-110.

item.title: US-180 West/AZ-61 West at Split
item.description: US-180 West/AZ-61 West at US-180/AZ-61 split. Turn right for US-180 West; continue straight for AZ-61 West.

item.title: US-180 West/AZ-61 West at Split
item.description: US-180 West/AZ-61 West at US-180/AZ-61 split. Turn right for US-180 west to Holbrook and Petrified Forest (National Park). Continue straight on AZ-61 west for Show Low.

item.title: US-180 West/AZ-61 West Approaching AZ-61
item.description: US-180 West/AZ-61 West approaching US-180/AZ-61 split.

item.title: US-180 West/AZ-61 West
item.description: US-180 West/AZ-61 West in St. Johns.

item.title: US-191 South/AZ-61 West at US-180
item.description: US-191 South/AZ-61 West at US-180. Turn left for US-180 East/US-181 South to Springerville.

item.title: US-191 South/AZ-61 West at US-180
item.description: US-191 South/AZ-61 West at US-180. AZ-61 is not signed at this intersection. Turn left for US-191 South/US-180 East. Continue straight for US-180 West/AZ-61 West.

item.title: US-191 South/AZ-61 West Approaching US-180
item.description: US-191 South/AZ-61 West approaching US-180.

item.title: US-180 West/AZ-77 North at BL-40
item.description: US-180 West/AZ-77 North at BL-40. Continue straight for BL-40 East/AZ-77 North (Navajo Blvd.). Turn left for BL-40 West/US-180 West (Hopi Drive).

item.title: AZ-77 North/US-180 West at BL-40
item.description: AZ-77 North/US-180 West at BL-40 in downtown Holbrook. Continue straight on Navajo Blvd. for AZ-77 North/BL-40 East. Turn left on Hopi Drive for US-180 West/BL-40 west.

item.title: AZ-77 North/US-180 West Approaching BL-40
item.description: AZ-77 north/US-180 west approaching BL-40 in Holbrook.

item.title: AZ-77 North To I-40
item.description: AZ-77 north to I-40 (and US-180 west which is not signed) in Holbrook.

item.title: South Apache Dr. at AZ-77 and US-180
item.description: S. Apache Dr. at AZ-77 and US-180. Use AZ-77 south for Snowflake; use AZ-77 north/US-180 west for Holbrook; use US-180 east for Petrified Forest.

item.title: AZ-77 North at US-180
item.description: AZ-77 north at US-180. Use US-180 east for St. Johns; use US-180 west/AZ-77 north for Holbrook.

item.title: AZ-77 North at US-180
item.description: AZ-77 north at US-180. Turn right for US-180 east; continue north on AZ-77 for US-180 east to I-40.

item.title: AZ-77 North Approaching US-180
item.description: AZ-77 North approaching US-180. US-180 joins AZ-77 into Holbrook.

item.title: NM-174 East
item.description: NM-174 east at US-180. Use NM-174 east for the Catwalk, and Whitewater Picnic Grounds.

item.title: NM-174 East
item.description: NM-174 east at US-180. Use NM-174 east for the Catwalk, and Whitewater Picnic Grounds.

item.title: US-180 West - Catron County Line
item.description: Catron County Line on US-180 west at the Grant-Catron County Line.

item.title: End NM-78 East at US-180
item.description: End NM-78 east at US-180. Use US-180 west for Glenwood. Use US-180 east for Silver City.

item.title: US-180 West Approaching NM-78
item.description: US-180 west approaching NM-78. Use NM-78 west for Clifton, AZ, Safford, AZ, and Mule Creek.

item.description: US-180 west approaching NM-78.

item.title: US-180 West Approaching NM-211
item.description: US-180 west approaching NM-211 to Gila. US-180 continues west to Cliff.

item.title: US-180 West - Silver City
item.description: US-180 west in Silver City. Turn right to continue on US-180 west.
